author: Nadine Ajaka
title: How to (Almost) Gift a Mountain
text: Bjørn Geirr Harsson is a retired Norwegian geophysicist with a grand gesture in mind: to give Finland a massive mountain that’s currently in Norway in honor of its 100 years of independence from Russia. In the short film Battle for Birthday Mountain , MEL films follows Harsson and his team as they attempt to tweak national borders for an unprecedented show of kindness. In the end, Norway decides to keep the mountain , but the process is unusual and inspiring—and Harsson still has hope his gift will go through someday. To see more films from MEL, visit their website and Vimeo page .
